sen.e: In the mythology, these tales are compared to 'the myth of Susanoo' in the Kojiki and the Nihonshoki, in which Susanoo was said to be crying all the time even he had arrived at manhood, and to 'the myth of Azisukitakahikone' in "Izumo no kuni Fudoki," in which Azisukitakahikone was not able to speak.
